problem.markdown:
>>What is a negawatt?<<
() a very small number of watts () a very large number of watts () as much carbon is sequestered as is released by an energy efficient building () the idea that all energy choices have consequences (x) the idea that saved energy is equal to generating new electricity
[explanation] A negawatt is a term coined by Amory Lovins stating that when there is a need for more electricity in an electrical network system, reductions in energy use have the same effect as generating new electricity. [explanation]
